Package de.fourzerofournotfound.rateyourstuff.rays.services.media.series

Class EpisodeService

java.lang.Object
de.fourzerofournotfound.rateyourstuff.rays.services.media.series.EpisodeService
@Service("episodeService")
public class EpisodeService
extends java.lang.Object

This Service is used to provide methods for the EpisodeController

Author:
Christoph Frischmuth, John Klippstein, Mickey Knop, Robin Beck

    • convertToDto

      public EpisodeDto convertToDto​(Episode episode)
      Converts a given episode to a episodeDTO object to limit the data that gets sent to the client
      Parameters:
      episode - the episode that should be converted
      Returns:
      the corresponding dtoObject

    • isValidEpisode

      public boolean isValidEpisode​(Episode episode)
      Checks if a episode can be stored within the database without causing duplicates
      Parameters:
      episode - the episode that should be checked
      Returns:
      true if the episode is not already stored in the database
